import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './index.scss' import LogoS from '../../assets/images/myLogo.png' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEnvelope, faHome, faUser } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faLinkedin, faGithub} from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' const Sidebar = () => (
) export default Sidebar
